addVisualizable(Tile) - Method in class gui.Game

APP_ICON_PATH - Static variable in class gui.ChessLite
 
attackingKing(Piece, ArrayList<Tile>) - Method in class gui.Board
Calculates the tiles attacking a given King and writes the Tiles to an ArrayList Calculation is performed by checking all of the possible attacking squares with a Diagonal shaped checking algorithm, a Horizontal one, and an L-shaped one.
attackWhiteListed(ArrayList<Tile>, Piece, ArrayList<Tile>) - Method in class gui.Board
Calculates the WhiteListed tiles based on a given King and the tiles attacking it, and writes the WhiteListed tiles to an ArrayList WhiteListed tiles are defined as Tiles that would be able to defend the King from Check without moving the King itself.
AudioClipPlayer - Class in fxutil
 
AudioClipPlayer(String) - Constructor for class fxutil.AudioClipPlayer
Constructs an AudioClipPlayer with a period refresh of 15

Constructs an AudioClipPlayer with an input period refresh and path
